name: Super Smash Bros. Melee: 20XX Training Pack
overview: 20XX Melee Training Hack Pack is a hack of Super Smash Bros. Melee made by achilles1515, that is designed to help players train for tournaments. 20XX is current on its version 4.06 (released April 20th, 2017). Character attacks and attributes are unchanged, so players can take what they have learned from 20XX and play Melee normally.
